description: The cat with a drill that mines and sells blocks to a duck in the shop. Seems logical, right?
This is a 2D game where you play as a cat that is stranded on an unknown planet. To escape the planet you need to get fuel for your rocket.
To reach greater depths you need to upgrade the drill with money you earned from selling mined blocks.

boxbot.name: Box Bot!
description:
Your new robot has arrived and is ready to be programmed by you.
Use logic blocks to program the robot to execute the required task while making sure the robot stays safe in it's environment.
All programming is done from the robots remote terminal that shows the robots location and live feedback from the robots program.
Your task as the boss is to complete a set of tasks and deliver the crate(s) to the target(s) using logic blocks.

mages-n-monsters.name: Mages 'n Monsters
description: Mages 'n Monsters is a 3D top-down bullet-hell shooter!
This is no ordinary shoot 'em up game, but pure chaos Test how good you really are.

You, the big mage, lives in a dungeon together with little mage. But just before you want to sleep little mage hears a noise coming from the dungeon and you decide to investigate. Quickly you find out that the dungeon is filled with scary monsters and you care using your magic to fight them. But little mage was captured and it's your task to save the little one. The story ends with an intense boss-fight!
